SEARCH
Package Library

Class Library

java.lang.Object
Library.Library
public class Library extends Object
The Library class manages library items, authors, and patrons. Provides methods for adding, editing, deleting, and searching these objects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Library()
    Initializes a new Library with empty lists for library items, authors, and patrons.
